page.title: 02ANTINGHAM CHURCHES/NEW ROAD
page.content: It is possible to see about 6 churches from the north west corner of this D-Block. However,the only one in the block is at Antingham.The D-Block has parts of 5 parishes so we asked the children at our school whether they went to church.We found that 31%did.Only one to Antingham. Antingham has 2churches and we do not really know the story behind it.We have been told that it was because two sisters argued about the building of a church so they both started building. Before they finished something is supposed to have happened to one of the sisters so one church was never finished.Today the unfinished church is covered in ivy and stands near the new road which was opened in 1984 making the A149 much wider and safer and away from Tavistock Farm.
